title: Flex Que ranked randomly changed
body: So i've been playing the new flex que and finsihed my placements, got silver 3 wasnt to happy about that but oh well what can you do, then after a couple of games all of a sudden a notice pops up saying after placements you have been placed in bronze 1. So i dont understand why all of a sudden i just dropped so far down.

replies.body:
~~It's a known ongoing issue, updates here: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/u2iR6nTU-ranked-flex-match-making-issues-update~~

UPDATE: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/XMZm8OPI-ranked-corrections-to-placement-results-and-ranks
